verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>eightieth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> after the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3318>come<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon's<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H2099>Zif,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> that he began to <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof was three <S%H8346>score<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H6242>twenty<s%> cubits, and the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And the <S%H197>porch<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1964>temple<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, <S%H5921>according<s%> <S%H6440><s%> to the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And for the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> of <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H8261>lights.<s%>

And <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3326>chambers<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, against the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, both of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> and of the <S%H1687>oracle:<s%> and he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about:

The <S%H8481>nethermost<s%> <S%H3326>chamber<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and the <S%H8484>middle<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> was <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad:<s%> for <S%H2351>without<s%> in the wall of the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H4052>narrowed<s%> rests <S%H5439>round<s%> about, that the beams should not be <S%H270>fastened<s%> in the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And the <S%H1004>house,<s%> when it was in <S%H1129>building,<s%> was <S%H1129>built<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> made <S%H8003>ready<s%> <S%H4551>before<s%> it was <S%H4551>brought<s%> thither: so that there was <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H4717>hammer<s%> nor <S%H1631>ax<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>tool<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> while it was in <S%H1129>building.<s%>

The <S%H6607>door<s%> for the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H6763>chamber<s%> was in the <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H1004>house:<s%> and they <S%H5927>went<s%> up with <S%H3883>winding<s%> <S%H3883>stairs<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> the <S%H8484>middle<s%> chamber, and out of the <S%H8484>middle<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H7992>third.<s%>
So he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3615>finished<s%> it; and <S%H5603>covered<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H1356>beams<s%> and <S%H7713>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar.<s%>

And then he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H3326>chambers<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high:<s%> and they <S%H270>rested<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H6086>timber<s%> of <S%H730>cedar.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Concerning <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are in <S%H1129>building,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in them; then will I <S%H6965>perform<s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> with you, <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father:<s%>
And I will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and will not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3615>finished<s%> it.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> with <S%H6763>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar,<s%> both the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H5604>ceiling:<s%> and he <S%H6823>covered<s%> them on the <S%H1004>inside<s%> with <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>covered<s%> the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H6763>planks<s%> of <S%H1265>fir.<s%>

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the <S%H3411>sides<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> both the <S%H7172>floor<s%> and the <S%H7023>walls<s%> with <S%H6763>boards<s%> of <S%H730>cedar:<s%> he even <S%H1129>built<s%> them for it <S%H1004>within,<s%> even for the <S%H1687>oracle,<s%> even for the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.
And the <S%H1004>house,<s%> that is, the <S%H1964>temple<s%> <S%H3942>before<s%> it, was <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> long.

And the <S%H730>cedar<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> was <S%H4734>carved<s%> with <S%H6497>knops<s%> and <S%H6358>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> was <S%H730>cedar;<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H7200>seen.<s%>

And the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H3559>prepared<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>within,<s%> to <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> in the <S%H6440>forepart<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> in <S%H753>length,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> in <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> in the <S%H6967>height<s%> thereof: and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H5462>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold;<s%> and so <S%H6823>covered<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> which was of <S%H730>cedar.<s%>

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> with <S%H5462>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold:<s%> and he made a <S%H5674>partition<s%> by the <S%H7569>chains<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle;<s%> and he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he had <S%H8552>finished<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house:<s%> also the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%> that was by the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
And within the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> each <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H6967>high.<s%>

And <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherub:<s%> from the <S%H7098>uttermost<s%> part of the one <S%H3671>wing<s%> to the <S%H7098>uttermost<s%> part of the <S%H3671>other<s%> were <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7095>size.<s%>
The <S%H6967>height<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> was it of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> <S%H8432>within<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> and they <S%H6566>stretched<s%> forth the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> so that the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> the one <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and the <S%H3671>wing<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H7023>wall;<s%> and their <S%H3671>wings<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H3671>one<s%> <S%H3671>another<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>
And he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

And he <S%H7049>carved<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7023>walls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4524>round<s%> <S%H4524>about<s%> with <S%H6603>carved<s%> <S%H4734>figures<s%> of <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees and <S%H6358>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers,<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> and <S%H2435>without.<s%>
And the <S%H7172>floors<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> he <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> <S%H6441>within<s%> and <S%H2435>without.<s%>

And for the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H1817>doors<s%> of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree:<s%> the <S%H352>lintel<s%> and side <S%H4201>posts<s%> were a <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part of the wall.

The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>doors<s%> also were of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree;<s%> and he <S%H7049>carved<s%> on them <S%H4734>carvings<s%> of <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees and <S%H6358>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H7286>spread<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> on the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> and on the <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees.
<S%H3651>So<s%> also <S%H6213>made<s%> he for the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> <S%H4201>posts<s%> of <S%H8081>olive<s%> <S%H6086>tree,<s%> a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> part of the wall.

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>doors<s%> were of <S%H1265>fir<s%> <S%H6086>tree:<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>leaves<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1817>door<s%> were <S%H1550>folding,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7050>leaves<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H1817>door<s%> were <S%H1550>folding.<s%>

And he <S%H7049>carved<s%> thereon <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees and <S%H6358>open<s%> <S%H6731>flowers:<s%> and <S%H6823>covered<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H3474>fitted<s%> on the <S%H2707>carved<s%> work.

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> with <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H2905>rows<s%> of <S%H1496>hewed<s%> <S%H1496>stone,<s%> and a <S%H2905>row<s%> of <S%H730>cedar<s%> <S%H3773>beams.<s%>
In the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> was the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7901>laid,<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H2099>Zif:<s%>

And in the <S%H259>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> in the <S%H3391>month<s%> <S%H945>Bul,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> was the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>parts<s%> thereof, and according to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4941>fashion<s%> of it. So was he <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H1129>building<s%> it.
